creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Hitomaro's poem (followed by detailed explanantion):
(I wonder
That I have to spend this night alone
The night might be prolonged
As long as trailing tails
Of lonely phesants)
{Ahibiki no
Yamadori no o no
Shidario no
Naganagashi yo wo
Hitori ka mo ne mu}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Illustrations of the Hundred Poems by the Hundred Poets (Hyakunin isshu no uchi)
title: Illustration of the Kakinomoto Hitomaro's Poem
